summary: An email sent to Assistant U.S. Attorneys on November 14, 2019, alleging corruption and cover-ups by Manhattan District Attorney Cyrus Vance Jr. in two matters: collusion with Cardinal Timothy Dolan to protect a priest accused of embezzlement and child abuse, and covering up a bribery scheme at Rikers Island involving inmate Gigi Jordan, her lawyer Alan Dershowitz, and corrections union head Norman Seabrook. The sender claims personal retaliation by Vance's office for attempting to expose these matters and offers to provide evidence.

persons.name: Cyrus Vance
persons.context: Accused of colluding with Cardinal Dolan to cover up a priest's embezzlement and child abuse, and covering up a Rikers Island bribery scheme involving Gigi Jordan and Norman Seabrook.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Allegedly involved in a Rikers Island bribery scheme where lawyers bribed corrections officers for special privileges for client Gigi Jordan, including contraband.

persons.name: Gigi Jordan
persons.context: A millionaire inmate accused of orchestrating a $20,000/month bribery scheme at Rikers Island from 2010-2015, with Norman Seabrook as the alleged recipient.

persons.name: Norman Seabrook
persons.context: Alleged recipient of bribes from Gigi Jordan's Rikers Island scheme, separate from the bribery case he was prosecuted for; described as having the entire jail involved.

persons.name: Cardinal Timothy Dolan
persons.context: Accused of colluding with Cyrus Vance to cover up embezzlement and child abuse by Father Miqueli, and of retaliating against the email sender.

persons.name: Fr. Miqueli
persons.context: A priest accused of embezzling a million dollars and child abuse at St. Francis Cabrini parish on Roosevelt Island; allegedly protected by Cyrus Vance and Cardinal Dolan.

persons.name: Gordon
persons.context: Manhattan ADA whom the sender emailed on May 19, 2015, about planned exposure of DA corruption; the sender was arrested 12 hours later.

persons.name: Bagdanos
persons.context: Gigi Jordan's prosecutor who allegedly admitted to the sender that the Manhattan DA's office knew about the Rikers bribery scheme but covered it up.

persons.name: Armond Durasanti
persons.context: Vance's Trial Bureau Chief whom the sender contacted about the Gigi Jordan bribery cover-up.

persons.name: Mark Peters
persons.context: Former Department of Investigation Commissioner who allegedly ordered investigations into the sender's claims to be 'squashed'.

persons.name: Judge Dawson
persons.context: Judge who dismissed the sender's case after receiving evidence of Manhattan DA corruption.

persons.name: Judge Heller
persons.context: Judge in Norman Seabrook's case who allowed bail pending appeal, contingent on no additional criminal actions.

persons.name: Ron Kuby
persons.context: Attorney pictured with Alan Dershowitz at Gigi Jordan's trial.

persons.name: Bailey
persons.context: Warden at Rikers Island who allegedly knew about the Gigi Jordan bribery scheme.

persons.name: Clifford
persons.context: Warden at Rikers Island who allegedly knew about the Gigi Jordan bribery scheme.

connections.description: Alleged collusion to cover up embezzlement and child abuse by Father Miqueli, as a favor from Vance to Dolan.
Alleged bribery scheme where Jordan paid Seabrook $20,000/month for special favors at Rikers Island.
Dershowitz was the lead lawyer for Gigi Jordan during her legal proceedings.
Alleged involvement in the Rikers bribery scheme where lawyers bribed corrections officers, with Seabrook as the union head recipient.
Alleged cover-up by Vance of the Gigi Jordan bribery scheme as a favor to Seabrook.
Alleged protection and cover-up of Miqueli's embezzlement and child abuse crimes by Vance.

events.title: Epstein Sex Offender Hearing
events.description: Cyrus Vance ordered his Sex Crimes Unit chief to appear in court to argue for downgrading Jeffrey Epstein to a Level 1 sex offender.

events.title: Sender's Arrest
events.description: NYPD arrested the email sender at their home 12 hours after they emailed ADA Gordon about plans to expose Manhattan DA corruption.

events.title: Gigi Jordan Rikers Bribery Scheme
events.description: Alleged $20,000/month bribery scheme at Rikers Island involving inmate Gigi Jordan, with Norman Seabrook as the recipient, covering the entire jail.

events.title: Norman Seabrook Sentencing
events.description: Seabrook's sentencing hearing where Judge Heller allowed bail pending appeal, contingent on no additional criminal actions.

events.title: Vance Corruption Evidence Collection
events.description: Sender claims to have collected evidence of corruption by Cyrus Vance from 2013 through the present, including emails and recordings.

locations: St. Francis Cabrini parish, Roosevelt Island
keyFacts: The sender alleges Cyrus Vance colluded with Cardinal Timothy Dolan to cover up a million-dollar embezzlement and child abuse by Father Miqueli.

A separate alleged cover-up involves a Rikers Island bribery scheme (2010-2015) where inmate Gigi Jordan paid Norman Seabrook, with her lawyer Alan Dershowitz implicated in facilitating bribes to corrections officers.

The sender claims personal retaliation: after emailing ADA Gordon about exposing corruption on May 19, 2015, they were arrested 12 hours later and maliciously prosecuted for 2.5 years until a judge dismissed the case.
The sender offers evidence to the U.S. Attorney's Office, suggesting it could help revoke Norman Seabrook's bail and pressure Alan Dershowitz to flip on Epstein's accomplices.
The document links Vance's actions to the Jeffrey Epstein case, noting Vance's office argued for downgrading Epstein's sex offender status in 2011.
